topic.title: Influenza Therapeutic Regimen Act - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Therapeutic Regimen Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.57)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Influenza Treatment Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.79)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Influenza Treatment Not Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.80)

7. SHALL contain [1..1] entryRelationship (specialized branch), which a. SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" Refers to (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC b. SHALL contain [1..1] observation , which i. SHALL contain [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) STATIC ii. SHALL contain [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) STATIC iii. observation/id SHALL be present, and SHALL equal Influenza case observation's observation/id ). iv. SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) STATIC v. SHALL contain [1..1] value/@code="6142004" Influenza (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC
SHALL conform to PHCR Therapeutic Regimen Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.57)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1940)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1941)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="133877004" Therapeutic regimen (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1943)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1944)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Influenza Treatment Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.79)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Influenza Treatment Not Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.80)

7. SHALL contain [1..1] entryRelationship (specialized branch), which a. SHALL contain [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" Refers to (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC b. SHALL contain [1..1] observation , which i. SHALL contain [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) STATIC ii. SHALL contain [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) STATIC iii. observation/id SHALL be present, and SHALL equal Influenza case observation's observation/id ). iv. SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) STATIC v. SHALL contain [1..1] value/@code="6142004" Influenza (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) STATIC
